newsitem.title: HUNGARY: Hungarian forints quietly ends steady vs dollar.
newsitem.headline: Hungarian forints quietly ends steady vs dollar.

text.p: The Hungarian forint returned to close at its opening level against the dollar on Tuesday, traders said, adding activity was light in afternoon trading.

The forint closed at 174.10 to the U.S. unit, unchanged from its level at opening this morning, and compared to 174.18/22 at midday. The Hungarian currency traded some 30 pips weaker than the central bank's resistance level.
"Activity was very little, the forint tracked the dollar/mark, which was trading in a narrow range," said Gabor Butor of Unicbank. -- Budapest newsroom +36 1 327-4040
